body: Bro don’t mind, he can still fuck Saeko in front of her to let her suffer and beg for his dick

Sounds like something she really would have done to ensnare him even in the canon story. Bitch didn't actually want him, just new he'd keep her safe in this fucked up world. Sometimes wish the author hadn't killed off her boyfriend because then we'd see how much Takashi really means to her. Saeko was best girl for Takashi...
